dcterms:creator: P. Lippus
T. Tuisk
N. Salveste
P. Teras
dcterms:description: The dataset includes several spontaneous Estonian dialogues with pairs of male and female talkers, totaling up to 10,158 utterances in high studio quality (5.2 hours of audio).
dcterms:title: Phonetic Corpus of Estonian Spontaneous Speech (EstPhon)

dcterms:creator: W. Yun
K. Yoon
S. Park
J. Lee
S. Cho
D. Kang
K. Byun
H. Hahn
J. Kim
dcterms:description: The Korean corpus consists of conversational dialogues between talkers, including a wide range of speaker ages. A randomly sampled subset of 12,000 utterances (5.0 hours) was used for syllabiÔ¨Åer training.
dcterms:title: Korean Corpus of Spontaneous Speech

dcterms:creator: M. Lennes
dcterms:description: The FinDialogue Corpus includes dialogues from 4 talkers (2 male) totaling 64 minutes of speech in total.
dcterms:title: FinDialogue Corpus of Spontaneous Finnish Speech

dcterms:creator: M. Avanzi
A.-C. Simon
J.-P. Goldman
A. Auchlin
dcterms:description: The C-PROM corpus consists of 24 multi-minute recordings of various regional varieties of French from several discourse genres, totaling 1.2 hours of data.
dcterms:title: C-PROM corpus of spoken French

dcterms:creator: J. J. Godfrey
E. C. Holliman
J. McDaniel
dcterms:description: The Switchboard corpus consists of spontaneous American English telephone conversations, using a syllable-annotated ICSI transcription project subset totaling 159 minutes.
dcterms:title: Switchboard corpus of spontaneous American English telephone conversations (SWB)
